name: PowerShell Tools for Visual Studio
tagline: PowerShell integration for Visual Studio 2012 and 2013.
body:
PowerShell Tools for Visual Studio =========== PowerShell integration for Visual Studio 2012 and 2013. More information on Adam Driscoll's blog. PowerShell Tools for Visual Studio currently offers the following features.

Script Editor Enhancements

Syntax Highlighting with customizable fonts and colors

IntelliSense for variables, cmdlets and arguments

Project System

PowerShell Project Template

PowerShell MSBuild Project Options

Debugging

Breakpoint and Breakpoint Pane Support

Stepping

Locals Support

Call Stack Support

Data Tips

Testing

Pester and PSate Test Adapters
